idea:
Femcare is a female and child health-focused platform which connects patients with specialist doctors and health counselors across 15 specialties like  Gynecology, Dermatology, Psychology, sexology, pediatrician, etc. 

Femcare solves the problem of low healthcare access to women in India and gender stereotype which prevent them from voicing their health problems. It bridges the gap between health practitioners and women patients.

Patients also have an option to keep all their medical records digitally saved and can access them anywhere anytime. Currently, Femcare has an android app and website.

Our mission is to provide high-quality healthcare access to women and children.
name: DUME HEALTHCARE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
ConvergenSEE India is a MarTech platform company, focused on empowering brands with our specialized Customer Acquisition technology solution. We are focused on Hyperlocal Search Marketing for brands with multiple customer touch points; our platform - makes hyperlocal search marketing simple, straightforward and easy to manage. The platform includes managing key features like Listing & Reputation for the brand across multiple directories like Google My Business, Facebook, Bing, Apple Maps and key local search portals, all through a single dashboard. We also offer value added services like Local Web Page Management, Local SEO, Content Management and more.  

Our platform empowers clients to manage their brand reputation and turn online searches into offline customers! We also partner with agencies to white label our platform to service their clients.


Local landing pages, or local pages for short, are web pages for every store location. 

Local Pages ensures that every time prospective customers search for relevant information, they are taken directly to the specific Google My Business / other online channels like maps, social media listings etc. without having to browse and search through multiple listings resulting in faster turn-around time and a smooth & seamless customer experience.

The ResidenSEE platform allows users to manage and update new content in a pre-set templatised format. This will ensure, that updated & standardized information is available to customers when they search for specific location and related information such as timings, addresses, contact details etc.
name: CONVERGENSEE INDIA MARTECH PRIVATE LIMITED
